snippet: Jérôme Champagne will challenge Sepp Blatter for the presidency of the ruling body of soccer, but the deck will be stacked against him.
lead_paragraph: Jérôme Champagne will challenge Sepp Blatter for the presidency of the ruling body of soccer, but the deck will be stacked against him.

headline.seo: Jérôme Champagne to Challenge Sepp Blatter for Top Soccer Post
headline.main: Unseating Head of FIFA May Be Toughest Task of All
headline.print_headline: Unseating Head of FIFA May Be Toughest Task of All
